## Status Quo

```{r, warning=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(gganatogram)

mylist <- list()

for (i in 1:length(gganatogram::mmFemale_list)){

mylist[[i]] <- gganatogram::mmFemale_list[[i]] |>
  remove_missing() |>
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("x", "y")) |>
  sample_frac() |>
  summarize(.by = id) |> 
  mutate(geometry = sf::st_cast(geometry, "POLYGON") |> 
           sf::st_cast("MULTIPOLYGON")) 
  
}  

```


```{r}
mylist |>
  bind_rows() ->
ref_data_mouse_f

head(ref_data_mouse_f)

# compare
head(ggseg::aseg)
ggseg::aseg$data$geometry

geom_organ <- ggregions::write_geom_region_locale(ref_data_mouse_f)
stamp_organ <- ggregions::write_stamp_region_locale(ref_data_mouse_f)

ref_data_mouse_f$id 

ggplot() + 
  stamp_organ() + 
  stamp_organ(keep = "aorta", color = "red") +
  stamp_organ(keep = "brain", color = "green")
```
